website_summaries.verdict: An all-in-one solution to keep your drinks cold in the outdoors.
pros: Thick urethane insulation and a freezer-grade lid seal allow this cooler to keep ice frozen for five days
Features include basket, cupholder, tie-down holes, metal bottle-opener, rubber feet, and a vacuum release button to prevent stuck lids
Soft latches hold up well to extended use
cons: Some reviewers reported issues with the drain plug

customer_reviews.title: Best value--nice features.
customer_reviews.text: We used this in conjunction with a small freezer to repeatedly freeze blue ice packs. It held temperature very well, and I was delighted by the cutting board, divider and basket. I have nothing to complain about--handles were easy, latches straight forward. I think it is a best value item--at least a hundred dollars cheaper than nearest competition. Somebody was thinking--and it shows.
customer_reviews.author: Forbzilla

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cooler at an Excellent Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a substantial cooler - excellent build. Nice features and superior cooling ability. You would be hard pressed to justify paying a significant premium for other bands in this tier of coolers. I would definitely recommend. Update: I have used this cooler numerous times and the ice doesn’t melt, for days on end. Amazing! And BTW, Yeti has denounced the NRA so save a $100 and buy this cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Ifittakesallsummer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the boat.
customer_reviews.text: If I could, is give it ten stars. I live in Miami, FL. In Friday night, I was getting the house ready for the next day. I figured I'd put two bags if ice in. It should hold till the next day. I had two 2 liters of soda for the kids. Several bottles of water and 16 bottles of beer. The next day and throughout the day, in full South Florida sun, the ice maintained. I couldn't clean the boat that night so I cleaned it on Sunday. Opened the cooler, and there was still plenty of ice. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I’m in Hawaii, kept ice just two days like my other cooler for $34.00
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good features not so good performance.
customer_reviews.text: I like the features of this cooler a lot and that and it's footprint is why I bought it but it only holds ice for about a day even if the drinks/food you put in there are chilled/frozen. I definitely expect more from a cooler costing this much as I could have got a Yeti or Rtic of similar size for cheaper or I could have got any of many other cheap knockoffs off of amazon for way cheap at this level of performance or better. Heck I could probably get this type of performance from the cheapest cooler at walmart maybe even the disposable styrofoam ones.
customer_reviews.author: John of all trades

customer_reviews.title: Leaking Drain Plug
customer_reviews.text: It's a good cooler and keeps food cold, but the big issue is the leaking drain plug. I put plumbers tape around the male end of the drain and the cap still leaks. I keep this cooler in my van and have to put a special mat underneath the drain plug to keep my van floor dry. Not something I expected to do. Should have bought a cheaper Coleman cooler instead.
customer_reviews.author: Low Tech Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Ergonomics
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to keep food and drinks cold. The ice chest sets in the back of truck (107 F yesterday) for 7 hours. Not in direct sunlight because the truck has a tonneau cover. About half the ice melted. I have decided that all of this hype about keeping ice for multiple days, is important, but nothing is going to work for very long in Texas summers. Good product and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Jim

customer_reviews.title: I've purchased their thermos and enjoyed the superior quality
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased their thermos and enjoyed the superior quality. Now.. After a recent trip where it pack this and a yeti I am very pleased. Kept ice just as well (if not better - Ice pack are hard to judge), has superior features and It's priced better by size. I will be expanding my Thermik collection.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Superior to a YETI
customer_reviews.text: I have a brother and many friends who have a YETI and this cooler has equal ice retaining ability and far more features. The build is superb. The release latches are better than anything I have seen on any other brand. The vacuum release makes is a lot easier to open. The only con is the weight, but you can't achieve this quality without the cooler being heavy. I'm buying a collapsible dolley to transport it.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a better cooler for years. I was looking at another "premium" brand but they were not available so I got this one. I am impressed with the storage capacity, and the center divider and lockable lid are big pluses for me. It is heavy, but that is due to the superb insulation. After pre-chilling before use it has kept block ice for up to 5 days in the Arizona heat. My cold drinks and food greatly appreciate it. I also got an additional e mail and printed instructions from the manufacturer on how to get the best performance from the cooler. Great stuff so far.
customer_reviews.author: BR

customer_reviews.title: Kept Ice Cold in Hawaii until Lava flowed over it June 5, 2018
customer_reviews.text: Now I am in Florida and wish I had one for backup. In Hawaii, I did not have electricity, water or refrigeration. When you are out planting vegetation (which is now covered with LAVA), you have to have something cold to drink, as well as keeping food cold. Civil Defense kicked me out in early May 2018. A great buy for a very short time.
customer_reviews.author: Marijane Scott

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Item doesnt hold ice even for 2 days, over night, was all melted by end of the next day
customer_reviews.author: corey

customer_reviews.title: Among the best!
customer_reviews.text: This cooler equals (and may actually surpass) the likes of Yeti & Pelican in terms of fit, finish, strength, durability, performance and features, as well as overall quality & value. If you know how to maximize “ice retention” (c’mon, people - use your head), this cooler will perform no different than any of the other highly rated products you might pay double the price for. Shop smart & buy with confidence!
customer_reviews.author: dan gainey

customer_reviews.title: Super Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love this cooler. However, after spending so much money on this, I was hoping it would keep the ice longer. I was able to go on 4 camping trips after I got it. We did not go to any place that was exceptionally hot. I followed the instructions to put ice in it the night before etc. It seemed like 1/2 of the cooler kept the ice really well and the other 1/2 didn't. I needed ice after 2 days. I could get that out of a regular cooler. I like the structure and aesthetic of the cooler, just disappointed in the keeping of ice.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Marston

customer_reviews.title: Built to Last
customer_reviews.text: Just took this cooler camping for two days. Chilled the cooler prior, used a combo of frozen water bottles and cubes ice. The cubes ice pretty much melted, the frozen water bottles lasted through with a little bit of melting but still remained icy. All food remained cold. We opened the cooler more than we probably should have, daily temps were about 90f. Construction is top notch, No leaking and very sturdy. No complaints here. Look forward to taking it on more trips.
customer_reviews.author: OrangeYouHappy?

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and keeps thing cold an amazing length of time.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing insulation, stays cold much longer than old style coolers. Well build and easy to move but very heavy when full. Keeps items cold for days. Adding frozen water bottles it will keep food cold for 4+ days. Cheaper than Yeti and more space internally. Great buy and will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Barry T

customer_reviews.title: My husband love everything about this cooler
customer_reviews.text: My husband love everything about this cooler. The cooler has plenty of room a cutting board used to divide the space and a basket to keep your food from getting soggy. Keeps ice for 4-5 days and does not leak around drain.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Platt

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, pretty happy with my purchase. We tested it our during some brutal summer heat, 93+, and didn't take the time to precool. Our large bag of ice lasted 4 days and the water kept our watermelon cool another day! The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is the cooler is a little heavy. Would not hesitate to recommend. Would put it against my brother's RTIC any day!
customer_reviews.author: justplainsouthern

customer_reviews.title: Kept ice for 4 days!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got the 25 gallon one and filled it with ice the night before the trip started. We then took her camping for three days, during which she was exposed to direct sunlight, opened quite frequently and left in a hot metal bear box. This thing still had ice when I finally got home after 4 days. I could not believe it. This thing is solid and weighs a bit more than your good ole Coleman. But cause I camp quite a bit, I consider her quite the upgrade. This thing rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Pancho

customer_reviews.title: Fulfilled all expectations
customer_reviews.text: The cooler is everything that it was advertised to be. I have only used it once so far as I just got it. After a day and a half I only poured about a glassful of water. It was so cold in the cooler at our destination that some liguids had ice forming. I had only used perhaps two pounds of ice to begin with. I love that it has a drain even thoI might use it less than expected. The only drawback is it's weight. It is surprising due to its quality. however. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Lois and Greg Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Better than I anticipated.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t want to spring for the BRAND NAME cooler, but needed something of comparable value. This cooler was exactly as advertised. It kept ice and drinks cold for 6 days. If you’re looking for great quality but don’t want to spend top dollar, I highly recommend Thermik.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing cooler
customer_reviews.text: I do not like wiring reviews, however this is an amazing product. Spent some good time researching, watching videos and comparing brands. I am surprise they have yet increased the price on this cooler. Yeti is well overpriced and 1/2 the features
customer_reviews.author: ASMIntegrators

customer_reviews.title: Good value for your money
customer_reviews.text: Yeti killer! If this thing doesnt leak then it's the best bang for your buck.. ice retention doesnt mean anything it's all about your environment... will update after some use
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Not a yeti
customer_reviews.text: It holds ice about 35%-50% of the time a yeti does. I should’ve just bought a yeti but I tried to be cheap. Still, a good cooler for sure. It’s a pain to lug around, so if you’re moving a lot don’t bother. To sit it somewhere for the weekend and grab as you go, it’s great. Just pay mind to filling the ice. The basket, cutting board separator and cup holder coming with it is nice too. I wish it held ice longer but that’s my only real complaint. Wheels would be nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Really liking all five that we ordered. 105 degrees ...
customer_reviews.text: Really liking all five that we ordered. 105 degrees all day long for three days and only had to add a bag of ice twice. So much more room for stuff and so much less water to deal with. On the way home we tossed the ice and water and everything stayed cold four hours later.
customer_reviews.author: Computer Addiction

customer_reviews.title: Will order again.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased, it held temp just as good as my cabella cooler. Much easier to open and the divider / cutting board really makes organization of the interior of the cooler easier. I will order more of these coolers in the future as they are a MUCH better value than yeti or Cabela's brand cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Leaking water, out of the water drain, I want to send it back,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cooler a couple of years ago and had to write a review. Best cooler I have had. Have taken it on a number of vacations and holds ice really well for me. Nice divider and cutting board inside. Just got back from the beach again with it and held ice for 2 days pretty easily and stayed cool for another day. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cooling for four days, plus. Great company
customer_reviews.text: I have given this cooler several positive reviews but in using it, it NEVER fails to leak. I wonder if anyone else has had this issue? I have contacted the manufacturer directly and am waiting for an answer. Follow-up: Emailed my issues to the company. They jumped on it, got me a new cooler and a label to ship the leaking one back to them. A+
customer_reviews.author: John Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Super Cooler
customer_reviews.text: The 25qt Thermik cooler is excellent in keeping food and drinks cool in extreme heat from the recent summer heat wave. We are using two large gel freezer pack and the cooler stayed very cold for over three days with the cooler in a hot car. Very pleased with the cooler efficiency and quality construction. One thing to mention is that size of the cooler, with its thick walls and extra height, the cooler is surprisingly larger than expected for a 25qt cooler.
customer_reviews.author: SaratogaJake

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Deal!
customer_reviews.text: It amazed me, compact space that you can fit everything in. From beverages to food, con isn’t trays to keep food from sitting in the water.
customer_reviews.author: cathy

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Got this cooler to use in emergencies. It is well built and I really like the two latches. This is a quality made cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Tony H.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME COOLER
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually leave reviews but this cooler was so amazing I had to. Purchased the cooler for a 5 day beach trip so we could keep food cold while on the beach. This cooler had ice retainage of 4 days in the direct sunlight for 10 hours a day. I highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a well built and designed cooler. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooler
customer_reviews.text: I love this cooler. I wish they made one in the same size, but a shorter profile. It is just a little to big to fit under my bed in my truck camping setup.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice high quality with really nice “extra’s” like bottle opener, divider/cutting board, high quality sealing, high quality handles, vacuum release, plus priced “fair” compared to Yeti plus has the extras.
customer_reviews.author: jerry k

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I purchased cooler May 2018 from Amazon. I've used it 3 times for long trips camping. The drain cap started leaking during 2nd use. Made a mess in my RV compartment. I drained the cooler, repacked it, then as the ice melts there is a slow drip. Unsure if the threads are defective or not. Having trouble finding manufacture and warranty info. I was going to put plumbers tape on the threads but I should not have to do this, it should be covered under warranty. I've had it 1 year, using it 3times.Other than this issue which is big, I love the cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t hold ice for more than 48 hrs on the shade.
customer_reviews.author: MPark

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Keeps drinks and food as cool as a Yetti, but came with features yeti makes you pay extra for. Bottle opener, cutting board, plug. It was a lil bigger than I was expecting, but has worked out great. I think it was a bargain after comparing all similar sized quality ice chests. Oh and the pressure valve, thought that wasn't really needed. Turns out when you have a quality ice chest that actually keeps things cool, unlike my old igloo, that this is a much needed feature!!! Best thing about this for me,...its made in the USA!!!!!! Buy American!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived as described.
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived as the product info describes. All the parts for the cooler were intact and undamaged. I haven't got a chance to test the insulating abilities since I just received the cooler but it looks well built with failsafes in mind so I ended up purchasing this cooler for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A PERFECT SIZE AND GREAT COOLER. I HAVE A PELICAN LARGE COOLER THAT WILL KEEP ICE FOT THREE DAYS AND IS RATED OVER THE YETI WE USED TO HAVE AND BOUGHT THIS SMALLER COOLER AND TOOK TO A THREE DAY GOLF TOURNEY AND WEATHER IN THE 80'S STILL HAD SOME ICE 3 FULL DAYS LATER IN THIS THERMIX I WILL BUY ANOTHER IF NEEDED
customer_reviews.author: Dan Bloodworth

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for price
customer_reviews.text: 4 days camping Cross country road trip Keeps ice and can lock for securing your beer This cooler is the sh*t!
customer_reviews.author: Thole

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Bottle openers on the corners are the simplest, most obvious addition to a cooler, why is this not on all coolers?! Very sturdy, great handles, cutting board divider comes in handy. All around great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dad

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooler and well made
customer_reviews.text: Nice cooler that gives Yeti a run for its money. I like that it’s 5 quarts more than the other guy’s product. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MLG

customer_reviews.title: Tolerated temps of 100 deg with heat index and kept our stuff cold almost 3 days!
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is hands down AMAZING! If I'd known that it was better than the yeti I would have never paid what I did, instead I'd own 2 or 3 of these!!! You wont regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: KylaTungate

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Fits between the seats of our motorhome. Will be our “mini-frig” on our travels. Also purchased special ice packs to use and expect 24 hours or more of cold for lunches and snacks. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: ccmo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cooler!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my boat, fits in the space it had to go out of the way and I love it so far!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Holds ice great. I would definitely recommend pre cool in first 4 best results very sturdy product.
customer_reviews.author: Brent H.

customer_reviews.title: We love this!
customer_reviews.text: We brought this for 4 days short trip including camping. It kept food and drink cool for 4 days. I love the cutting board separator which helps keep the food and drink in place. It looked small when we first received , but the extra depth really gives extra storage space and we are very happy with this purchase !
customer_reviews.author: Riki

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Love this cooler. Just what I was look for. Love having to compartments and a basket to keep food dry.
customer_reviews.author: Calliecat

customer_reviews.title: Ice stays ice for a long time.
customer_reviews.text: just tested my new thermik for trip back home. After 4 days, still ice and everything in frozen shape. Fits my needs perfectly. Now for an ultimate test of hiking for 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Drain plug leaking after only owning a few short months.
customer_reviews.text: Great product but drain plug leaks after only owning a few short months. Unable to find anything on warranty information or how to contact seller. Disappointing. Update 9/8/18. Manufacturer contacted me after negative review and resolved my issue. As previously stated product is great! Changing rating to 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Cstar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size...not to big but big enough!
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is as advertised! Love the size but not too big to carry comfortably. Has held ice for extended periods and has lots of nice perks like drain, cup holder, basket, cutting boar/divider and is lockable if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like a Yeti
customer_reviews.text: It was given as a gift but our friends absolutely Loved it! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: m.smith

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product holds ice in hot truck for days, the pressure release button proves how well the seal works. This is not a lightweight cheap knock off of anything. Nice job!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Compares to others and less expensive
customer_reviews.text: Love this cooler. We’ve had ice in it for a week. It is easy to carry, fits great on a boat, easy to open with the pressure release and it stays where you put it. Friends with other brand name were impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it and comes with cutting my board and drink holder
customer_reviews.author: bob jensen

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler! Heavy which was to be expected
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler! Heavy which was to be expected. Filled it with ice and drinks for a trip up to Virginia and not one ice cube was melted when we got there almost 8 hours later. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Annabella Durham

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit standard garden hose.
customer_reviews.text: The description claims that the drain plug fits a standard garden hose. The one I received does not. It has the wrong number of threads per inch. Kinda ruined the plans I had for the cooler. Otherwise it seems like a really good cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Rudolph

customer_reviews.title: I love it so far
customer_reviews.text: I love it so far! Kept the food cool 2 of the hottest days of year on a kayak trip.
customer_reviews.author: Sadak

customer_reviews.title: Quality Item
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Can stand on it, probably shouldn't. Works as stated. Stays cold. Impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbybradner

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooler  till drain plug leaks profusely
customer_reviews.text: I loved this cooler till the drain plug started leaking. I emailed thermix to no avail. It leaked so bad the stow in go in van the clothes molded due to the heat. Great cooler but the drain plug is an issue after reading more reviews
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: and cup holder arriving with cooler is fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: Quality product and fast delivery. Basket, divider, and cup holder arriving with cooler is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Biff

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Put frozen foods in on Friday morning and they were still frozen on Monday afternoon. Ambient temps were in the 50s to 60s during the day and 30s at night. Happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall D.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Love all the features, made top notch quality. Can't wait to use it in the Texas heat next year. But so far I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Emrick

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is fantastic! If you’d never seen any of the competitors, you would say it’s amazing, and the originator. When you compare it to say a RTIC, or YETI, I think its better either way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cold Saver
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is exactly what I wanted. In a 5 day back country trip it kept ice and meat cold. Great Value and not overpriced for a more recognizable brand. Sturdy and not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ice box
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time with great accessories and amazing quality! Love this cooler
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cooler I took it on a four day music festiva ,l it sat in the sun the whole time and kept ice till the last day. If I could think of one in provement it would be the cupholder is not big enough to fit an insulated Cousy other than that it’s a safe great purchase I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Destry L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it!! GreAt value a must have if you long term travel.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Lang

customer_reviews.title: I liked the locking tabs the best
customer_reviews.text: I liked the locking tabs the best. I Was a little surprised at How heavy it was. Overall it’s a great product and it kept all my meat frozen for 10 days with just 5 pounds of dry ice I’d buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Fay

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Everything I expected and more. Fantastic Cooler and I hate to say it but my buddies with the RTIC and Yeti's are invious of the nice features, quality of the design and overall high end appearance. They have great cool boxes but the Thermik offers more..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and actually works.
customer_reviews.text: I road tripped for two weeks from Bakersfield to Vegas through Utah Colorado and back and only added ice a few times. Even sitting in the back of my truck in the 106 degree Vegas heat the ice never melted completely.
customer_reviews.author: David Myers

customer_reviews.title: Kooler
customer_reviews.text: very well built cooler and a very fair price, Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Michael F.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I really like the extra depth being 25 quarts and all the accessories. It is very well made and keeps drinks cold all day in 95+ degree temperatures with two cooler shock gel packs I would definitely recommend this cooler it's a quality product
customer_reviews.author: jts

customer_reviews.title: I Regret Nothing
customer_reviews.text: This is a no-brainer. The Thermik 75 is one-third the price of a comparably sized Yeti, has superior features (bottle openers, cutting board, basket, and cup holder), and it is just as tough and efficient at keeping ice.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: The unit is remarkably solid and certainly lives up to ...
customer_reviews.text: The unit is remarkably solid and certainly lives up to the reviews here that persuaded me to purchase this in the first place. As a cooler, it is outstanding. Of course it is more expensive that those that you see at Walmart, Target or HomeDepot but granted, it surpasses them in all areas especially for what it was intended for, keeping things cold.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley H.

customer_reviews.title: This cooler works really well! My husband loves it ...
customer_reviews.text: This cooler works really well! My husband loves it for his fishing trips. Even here in Florida, the ice lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Ann Harris

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the quality
customer_reviews.text: We've had the thermic 4 two weeks used it twice second time we used it one of the latches broke pin came out in the plastic broke
customer_reviews.author: bethv

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I find this cooler to perform only slightly better than a run-of-the-mill $20 cooler from a department store. I am extremely disappointed with the performance given the cost. I ended up replacing ice every other day on 8 day road trip through the Sierra Nevadas where most days were in the mid 80's (ambient temp). Also, the cooler managed to severely pinch my fingers more than once which in my opinion can be related to a design flaw with the handle. Overall, I feel like this cooler is worth only a fraction of its cost.
customer_reviews.author: B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works better than described.
customer_reviews.text: Best, second one I got for boat. Use daily ,saves ice in hot Florida sun for days. Capt.Rich
customer_reviews.author: rich kleinhans

customer_reviews.title: The tall 25 qt model is perfect. Same footprint as the 20 qt but fits ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing Rocks! The tall 25 qt model is perfect. Same footprint as the 20 qt but fits my tall water bottles. Keeps my ice packs frozen for 2 days so far!
customer_reviews.author: RacerXDB

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler
customer_reviews.text: Love this cooler! I need to transport raw food for my dogs when I take them out of town and this cooler is extremely trustworthy. Very well designed and things stay FROZEN for a long time. If I end up in a hotel without a fridge, I feel I can keep their food fresh.
customer_reviews.author: RRay

customer_reviews.title: Fits well between MB Sprinter front seats
customer_reviews.text: It works great. I especially like the options that come with it that you do not have to purchase separately. The basket, cutting board and cup holder. This cooler fits very well in between the seats of a 2016 sprinter.
customer_reviews.author: vtx900c

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. exceeded expectations. Now this is a cooler
customer_reviews.author: Don Waldrop

customer_reviews.title: IT keeps your refreshments colder than any cooler.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the cooler it's good looking and keep's you refreshment's than any cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis E. Dickess

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: A garden hose did not thread to the drain as advertised but the customer service is good and they said they would send me a new drain plug.
customer_reviews.author: marc

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a REALLY nice cooler. It makes my friends Yeti seems way over priced compared to the Thermik which is heavier and has many more features. The Thermik comes with a cutting board, can holder and a storage basket. Here is something your not going to believe, but when I went to find a place to buy another another can holder and couldn't, I contacted Thermik directly and the "owner" said they don't sell them as an accessory but would send me one free if I sent in my invoice. Week later, there it was. Like I said, you will not go wrong with this purchase and I really mean it.
customer_reviews.author: Just1dude

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my son, Who is going cross country ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son, Who is going cross country. He likes it so far, testing how long Ice will last, loves the 2 bottle openers, the tray to keep some food separate, it’s a keeper
customer_reviews.author: Gena Hentnik

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and keeps ice and drinks cold for days
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who is a general contractor. It has been a life saver this summer in the Texas heat! Perfect size and keeps ice and drinks cold for days. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kept my water cold went from spending 3.00 a day on ice to 3.00 a week
customer_reviews.author: dan fliehs

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Cooler!!
customer_reviews.text: Best cooler Iʻve ever had. Keeps ice for days. Nice and clean unit. Do the suggested prep for first use and youʻll definitely see a difference from other cooler models.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Garcia Candelaria

customer_reviews.title: Better than a yeti!
customer_reviews.text: Live this cooler. Used it two times already and I have nothing but good things to say about it. It is engineered extremely well, it holds ice for more than three days and it has added features that would cost you more with a yeti. Safe to say I am pretty damn happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: KRS

customer_reviews.title: Quality Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Have yet to use this but its is very well put together and great quality. Looking forward to using it. Great price
customer_reviews.author: Gtb

customer_reviews.title: Best chest I've ever owed
customer_reviews.text: Just camped for 6 days. Only had to add ice on last day. It still had some but wanted to ensure it stayed cold for the ride home
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Please explain
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t receive a manual and I don’t understand the just add water line. Please explain. I do like the cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Natane

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler for the price. As good if not better than a yeti. Love the cutting board devider. It will be great for the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery N Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: So glad I purchased that cooler and I like the ice ...
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased that cooler and I like the ice that last for days. I would recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price great cooler love the extras included thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: john c robinson jr

customer_reviews.title: A great system!
customer_reviews.text: Well conceived system, great execution! The cutting board serving as a divider was a really neat feature. Handle, corner bottle openers, all very well thought out!
customer_reviews.author: David D Van Wagoner

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the BEST cooler I've ever owned! The cutting board divider is an awesome feature, along with the separation rack and drink holder. I own a Yeti cooler as well and the Thermik surprised the heck out of me by storing ice longer and at 1/2 the price. I'm sold! I'd love to see and executive travel size as well. Watch out Yeti!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Thermik High Performance Roto-Molded Cooler, 45 qt, White
feature_bullets: Rugged one piece rotationally molded construction with textured top lid and soft damage proof latches
Thick urethane insulation keeps ice for 5+ days, the same retention performance as Yeti and Rtic
Freezer grade lid seal with vacuum release button to prevent stuck lids
Features indestructible hinge, durable rubber feet and tie down holes
Includes cutting board separator, dry keeper basket, and drink holder - 5 year warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars171 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
